description: At SMArtX Advisory, I was part of the Market Data Squad responsible for maintaining and updating stock market data, symbols, and prices for our turnkey asset management platform. One of my key projects was the 'Database Sync Tool Runner,' where we needed to synchronize multiple databases using AWS Serverless Lambdas. To overcome the execution limit, I implemented a solution with AWS SQS and SQL Server to break up tasks and run them synchronously.

projects.name: Database Sync Tool Runner
projects.description: Developed a system to synchronize multiple databases using AWS Serverless Lambdas. Employed AWS SQS and SQL Server to break up tasks and run them synchronously.

projects.name: Secret Password Manager
projects.description: Implemented AWS Secrets Manager and Secrets Manager Cache to quickly look up and create database connection strings based on user AWS credentials.

projects.name: Load Balancing API
projects.description: Created load balancing tests for APIs and posted results to Amazon CloudWatch.

description: At Gohman Mechanical, I started my career as a Construction Assistant and transitioned to the IT department while pursuing a degree in computer science. I discovered the inefficiencies in using Excel for reports and shifted to .Net and SQL Server, igniting my passion for software development. I built automation projects to assist the company and managed the IT department concurrently.

projects.name: Gohman Mechanical Website
projects.description: Designed and developed a simple web application showcasing company information and projects. Recently, the website was replaced with a Wix site to facilitate easier updates for current employees.

projects.name: Construction Quote Tracker
projects.description: Developed a solution to track information acquired during the bidding phase of construction projects.

projects.name: Price Markup Calculator
projects.description: Designed a small Android application that service technicians use to provide vendor pricing and markup details to customers in the field.

projects.name: Service Quote Estimator
projects.description: Developed an Excel-based tool to create quotes for service repairs efficiently.

projects.name: Transit and Tax Lookup
projects.description: Implemented a web scraper tool to look up tax and transit information based on job site addresses, assisting with payroll analysis and reporting.

description: I joined Gohman Mechanical as an expeditor, delivering equipment and material to job sites. Through college classes on AutoCAD, I transitioned to the office and provided assistance with drawings, accounts payable, and accounts receivable for construction projects. Over time, I expanded my role into designing, quoting, permitting, and collaborating with general contractors and architects on a diverse range of projects.
